en.subject: ğŸ”‘ New API Key Generated
en.preheader: Your API key is ready to use

body.intro: A new API key has been generated for your Purra account.

security.title: ğŸ” Important Security Information
items: This is the only time you'll see the full API key
Store it securely - treat it like a password
Never share your API key publicly or commit it to version control
Regenerate the key immediately if compromised
Monitor API usage from your dashboard

usage.title: Getting Started
usage.description: Check our API documentation for integration guides, code examples, and best practices for using your new API key.

body.footer: Secure API access for your applications.
